Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Central Park
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Pulaski, Diversey and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Pulaski, Diversey and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Central Park.
